channel.title: David Dreyer Lassen
channel.description: Recent content on David Dreyer Lassen

item.title: Display Jupyter Notebooks with Academic
item.description: Learn how to blog in Academic using Jupyter notebooks

item.title: Academic: the website builder for Hugo
item.description: Create a beautifully simple website in under 10 minutes.

I am professor of Economics at the University of Copenhagen. I am the founding director of the Center for Social Data Science (SODAS) and co-deputy director of the Center for Economic Behavior and Inequality (CEBI), established in 2017 through a grant from the Danish National Research Foundation. I am the Chair of the Independent Research Fund Denmark, and was a member of the 2017-8 Committee for Better University Education (Udvalget for bedre universitetsuddannelser).
